questions.question: What does 'in the nick of time' mean?
options: Just in time, at the last possible moment

questions.question: If something happens 'at the eleventh hour,' when does it occur?
options: At the very last moment before a deadline

questions.question: What does 'time flies' express?
options: Time seems to pass very quickly

questions.question: If you 'kill time,' what are you doing?
options: Doing something to occupy yourself while waiting

questions.question: What does 'better late than never' mean?
options: It's better to do something late than not at all
Being on time is not important

questions.question: If you are 'living on borrowed time,' what does that mean?
options: You are continuing to live or exist longer than expected

questions.question: What does 'a race against time' describe?
options: A situation where you must finish something before a deadline

questions.question: If something stands 'the test of time,' what has it done?
options: Remained popular or effective over a long period

questions.question: What does 'turn back the clock' mean?
options: Return to an earlier time or way of doing things

questions.question: If someone says 'time is money,' what do they mean?
options: Time is a valuable resource that shouldn't be wasted
You get paid by the hour

questions.question: What does 'around the clock' mean?
options: Continuously, all day and all night

questions.question: If you 'bide your time,' what are you doing?
options: Waiting patiently for the right moment to act

questions.question: What does 'behind the times' mean?
options: Living in a different time zone
Old-fashioned or not up to date

questions.question: If something is done 'in the fullness of time,' when will it happen?
options: Eventually, when the time is right

questions.question: What does 'time heals all wounds' suggest?
options: Emotional pain eventually fades as time passes
Physical injuries heal in exactly one day
